title: Ep69: Pussy Power and Sex Work Feat Raquel Savage

description:
We have finally made it to the coveted episode 69 and it was only right to bring on the host of the Savage Life Podcast, Raquel Savage. On this episode the trio delve into sex work and "the oldest profession". The kink of the week is a messy one and Raquel brings her expertise in the bedroom to the show and explains the power of the pussy! Also,do you have a price tag on your pussy? The group discuss the thin line between prostitution and getting money from a man you deal with. Raquel also has quite the response to Andrew Shulz's take on new pussy and the use on condoms. Follow Raquel on IG @raquelsavage and Twitter @raquel_savage Shoutout to @passport_cutty for the #CuttyQuote of the show! Make sure you follow her on social media for your daily dose of realness and purchase her book "The M in Man is for Money" Want to support the podcast and receive more content? Become a Patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions Also, send your heauxmail to whoreibledecisions@gmail.com
